entry.string: The XarLDAP module allows you to configure an LDAP server that Xaraya will use for authentication or searching.
entry.translation: Zee XerLDEP mudoole-a elloos yuoo tu cunffeegoore-a un LDEP serfer thet Xereya veell use-a fur oozeenteeceshun oor seercheeng.

entry.string: You must configure XarLDAP before you can successfully authenticate a user with the AuthLDAP module or search the LDAP server.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost cunffeegoore-a XerLDEP beffure-a yuoo cun sooccessffoolly oozeenteecete-a a user veet zee OothLDEP mudoole-a oor seerch zee LDEP serfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: From the menu, you have the following choices:.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a zee fullooeeng chueeces:.

entry.string: Modify Config -- From here, you can configure the LDAP server.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeeg -- Frum here-a, yuoo cun cunffeegoore-a zee LDEP serfer.

entry.string: Test Connnection -- Test the connection the LDAP server.
entry.translation: Test Cunnnecshun -- Test zee cunnecshun zee LDEP serfer.

entry.string: There are no included blocks with the XarLDAP Module
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet zee XerLDEP Mudoole
